title: Looking for someone to hang out with.
body: I'm just a 14 year old kid wanting to play some league with some people or just 1 person. I have lot's of other games and i'm able to run them at high quality so you don't have to worry about me lagging hopefully. If your interested in playing league or just any other games in general be sure to hit me up on discord. I'm level 20 on my NA account because i only play with Americans on league but I'm only level 10 on my Oceania. Although my level is low i was playing with level 30 all the time on NA so I'm quite good but not the best. Add me on discord Sohda#7291

replies.body: Yes im secretly a 42 year old man.... haha nah im just really bored playing by myself and on american servers
